entry.title: Pasquariello Ieee Access
entry.content: Our joint article â€œModel-Based Systems Engineering for Digital Twin System Development Applied to an Aircraft Seat Test Benchâ€ by Pasquariello A., Bouhali I., Leherbauer D., Abdeljabbar N., Mhenni F., Patalano S., Hehenberger P. and Rega A. appeared in IEEE Access (Volume 13). Read the open-access paper via its DOI.
entry.summary: Our joint article â€œModel-Based Systems Engineering for Digital Twin System Development Applied to an Aircraft Seat Test Benchâ€ by Pasquariello A., Bouhali I., Leherbauer D., Abdeljabbar N., Mhenni F., Patalano S., Hehenberger P. and Rega A. appeared in IEEE Access (Volume 13). Read the open-access paper via its DOI.

entry.title: Leherbauer Lce 2025
entry.content: Leherbauer D., Wagner E., Kneidinger C. and Hehenberger P. presented â€œModel-based Electricity Consumption Quantification of Polymer Extruders for Mechanical Recycling Applicationsâ€ at the 32nd CIRP Conference on Life Cycle Engineering (LCE 2025) in Manchester, UK, advancing our research on sustainable manufacturing.
entry.summary: Leherbauer D., Wagner E., Kneidinger C. and Hehenberger P. presented â€œModel-based Electricity Consumption Quantification of Polymer Extruders for Mechanical Recycling Applicationsâ€ at the 32nd CIRP Conference on Life Cycle Engineering (LCE 2025) in Manchester, UK, advancing our research on sustainable manufacturing.

entry.title: Schmid Cirp Design
entry.content: Schmid D., Merschak S., Lack S. and Hehenberger P. shared â€œTowards a framework for automatic disassembly supporting circular economyâ€ at the 35th CIRP Design Conference 2025 in Patras, Greece, outlining our latest concepts for circular product lifecycles.
entry.summary: Schmid D., Merschak S., Lack S. and Hehenberger P. shared â€œTowards a framework for automatic disassembly supporting circular economyâ€ at the 35th CIRP Design Conference 2025 in Patras, Greece, outlining our latest concepts for circular product lifecycles.

entry.title: Peter Keynote
entry.content: Peter is member of the International Program Committee of the 22nd International Conference on Research and Education in Mechatronics (REM 2024) in Jordan. We organized the conference 2019 in Wels.
entry.summary: Peter is member of the International Program Committee of the 22nd International Conference on Research and Education in Mechatronics (REM 2024) in Jordan. We organized the conference 2019 in Wels.
